amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to delay the national primary drinking water regulation for Arsenic published on January 22, 2001 in the Federal Register or to propose or finalize a rule to increase the levels of arsenic in drinking water permitted under that regulation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 45 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to delay the national primary drinking water regulation for Arsenic (published in the Federal Register) or to propose or finalize a rule to increase the levels of arsenic in drinking water permitted under that regulation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonior amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 189 (Roll no. 288).
